description.p: While Attuned, the wearer has Truesight to a range of 30ft., their Charisma score increases to 16 (if it's already 16 or higher there's no alteration) and they gain proficiency in the intimidation and performance skill.

Truesight.A creature with truesight can, out to a specific range, see in normal and magical darkness, see invisible creatures and objects, automatically detect visual illusions and succeed on saving throws against them, and perceives the original form of a shapechanger or a creature that is transformed by magic. Furthermore, the creature can see into the Ethereal Plane.
While Attuned, the wearer's Constitution score is raised to 20
Goliath's Duality.After making a successful unarmed strike while wearing these gloves deal an extra 2d10 force damage to the target, and you can choose one of 2 effects:
Soul Stealer.Regain a number of hit points equal to the force damage dealt.
Soul NUmbening.Gain advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw you make before the end of your next turn..
